name: GNTT Author bio
author: Golzarrahman

sections.description: To display the GNTT Author bio at the bottom of your pages or posts to just install the plugin. plugin url:’http://market.mathgr.com/gntt-author-bio/’
sections.installation:
1. Download the zip file and extract the contents,
  2. Upload the folder local-time-clock to your WP plugin folder /wp-content/plugins/ directory,
  3. Go to Plugins > Plugins, and activate the plugin,
  4. To display the GNTT Author bio at the bottom of your pages or posts to just install the plugin.
sections.faq:
Q. Is GNTT Author bio free?

Ans.Yeah, 1.0 version is free. But, for premium version should be paid.You will get option panel in the premium version and will change background-color, border-color, text-color as your wish.

Q. Can I use multiple display?

Ans.Yeah, it will make a display after every page or post.

Q. Can I use Different size?

Ans.Yeah, to use different size you have to use premium version.Similarly you can change background-color, border-color, text-color as your wish.
